releaseNotes:
v0.0.6 - Fixed trigger/condition/action save flow:
- Save buttons now properly navigate back and save data
- Fixed issue where clicking Save would clear form without saving
- Cancel now properly discards changes

- Fixed get_device failing for Matter RGBW and Ecobee devices
- Fixed get_hub_info, list_variables, get_variable error handling
- Added rule rename/description editing in UI
- Improved create rule flow with success message and direct link to configure

v0.0.4 - Added full Rule Engine UI.

v0.0.3 - Initial release.
